name: Eraser Packs
description:
OPPS. Sometimes we make mistakes. Be sure to have these sweet little erasers with you on your creative adventures. 

Erasers are .5x.4 inches in length

Each eraser pack comes with a pack of 5 erasers, each with a printed number 40.

name: Creative Book Set
description:
This trio of notebooks is made from 100% recycled paper and each book is blank inside waiting for your creativity. 

Dimensions:
 5x7inches

Paper: 
Cover: 100% Recycled Chipboard, Kraft
Interior: 100% Recycled Text, 70# White

Page Count: 
20 pages in each creative book

name: Gradient Art Tote / Regular
description:
The smaller two-tone color option of our top selling large tote. A Perfect tote for art supplies, school books, or sunday's shopping. Our art totes are made of 100% recycled cotton canvas, screenprinted using eco friendly inks, and measures: 16"W x 15.5"H; 5" bottom gusset; and 22" handles.

*Creative Creatures logo is one-sided.

ARE YOU A CREATIVE CREATURE?

name: Gradient Art Tote / Large
description:
The two-tone color option of our top selling tote. A Perfect tote for art supplies, school books, or sunday's shopping. Our large art totes are made of 100% recycled cotton canvas, screenprinted using eco friendly inks, and measures: 19" wide x 15.5" tall x 7.5" bottom gusset and 22" handles.

*Creative Creatures logo is one-sided.

ARE YOU A CREATIVE CREATURE?

name: Color Wheel Pencil Sets
description:
Meet the warm, cool, & classy colors of the color spectrum. Each color wheel pencil set is filled with beautiful LYRA pencils. Each set comes with a sweet little eraser and is placed in a biodegradable clear sleeve perfect for gifting or storing.

Choose from our 'Warm', 'Cool', or 'Classy' sets:

The 'Warm' Set
(Red, Pink, Orange, Yellow, & Yellow Green)
Say hello to the warmer colors of the color spectrum. They are bold, & bright & reckon to be heard.

The 'Cool' Set
(Green, Forest, Blue, Midnight, & Purple )
These are the cool colors of the color spectrum. They are subtle & calm & can convey many emotions.

The 'Classy' Set
(Black, White, Silver, & Gold )
Meet the statement seekers of the color spectrum. These colors shimmer, they shine. When they come to create, people notice. 

When checking out, be sure to let us know which pencil set you would like by writing 'Warm', 'Cool', or 'Classy' in the note to seller section.

Be apart of our giving creatures community!
All proceeds from our online shop go directly into our community art projects, programs, and events. Shop with us and give back to your community creatively!

name: Creative Art Sack
description:

name: Primary Colored Pencils.
description:
Did you know...
The colors red, yellow, & blue are known as primary colors. You can use these 3 colors in an array of combinations to make any color of the color wheel. 

Our colored Pencil kits come with 3 large hexagonal wooden pencils made by Yorik in Germany. Each pencil kit comes with a sweet little eraser and is placed in a biodegradable clear sleeve perfect for gifting or storing.

Be apart of our giving creatures community!
All proceeds from our online shop go directly into our community art projects, programs, and events. Shop with us and give back to your community creatively!
